meanings: (장소) place, point, (특정 지점) spot, location, (터) site, (지역) area
A living (person's) mouth would not be cobwebbed , Everyday brings its bread with it

meanings.meaning: a person's place of habitual residence

vlive.korean: 근데 형 살던 곳은 그냥 길 걸으면 거기가 찜질방 아니에요? Well, isn't a Korean sauna near your place? Within a walking distance? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : #톡투데이0930
vlive.english: Well, isn't a Korean sauna near your place? Within a walking distance?

vlive.korean: 언니 살던 곳이야? - 아니요 - 뭐요? Is it your hometown? - No. - What is? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 채연이의 고민상담2♡
vlive.english: Is it your hometown? - No. - What is?

vlive.korean: 그래? - 네가 살던 곳에는 밤을 어떻게 해서 먹었어? really? - Then how do people eat chestnuts? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] April X LieV - 에이프릴의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: really? - Then how do people eat chestnuts?

vlive.korean: 저희 살던 곳이었잖아요. - 그렇죠. - 저쪽이죠, 저쪽. Where we used to live. - That's right. - Over there. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : <한강블루스> 스팟라이브 ' Spot Live'
vlive.english: Where we used to live. - That's right. - Over there.

vlive.korean: 박수근, 백남준 살던 곳이 거기 있다 하는 것이 고마워서, 신기해서 그걸 연계해서 얘기했어요. Park Soo Geun and Nam Jun Paik, lived there. So I introduced it. 듣기 View video V BOOKS : <나의 문화유산답사기> 저자 유홍준 생중계, '서울을 말하다'
vlive.english: Park Soo Geun and Nam Jun Paik, lived there. So I introduced it.

examples.korean: If I accept the job, it will mean uprooting my family and moving to Italy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 그 직장을 받아들인다면 그것은 우리 가족을 오래 살던 곳에서 이탈리아로 이사를 시켜야 함을 의미한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
